commits.headline: fix(restart-assistant): enforce history preservation and add safe parsing
commits.body: - Remove preserveHistory parameter that contradicted "always true" guarantee

commits.headline: Revamp WP Fusion dashboard: triage all tickets, improve Slack summary
commits.body: Updated the WP Fusion support dashboard workflow to triage all active tickets, not just unread ones. The agent now decides if a ticket is technical and only posts internal notes when they add meeting-worthy value. Slack summary output is now block-based, with clearer categorization and improved formatting. Documentation and test workflow updated to reflect the new triage and reporting logic.

commits.headline: fix: use NPM_TOKEN for npm publish authentication
feat: add robinhood-mcp to server inventory
commits.body: New Python MCP server for read-only Robinhood portfolio research.

commits.headline: feat: initial robinhood-mcp implementation
commits.body: Read-only MCP server for Robinhood portfolio research using robin_stocks.

commits.headline: Add OpenAI-compatible chat completions endpoint
commits.body: Introduces a /v1/chat/completions endpoint to src/server.js for compatibility with OpenAI clients such as SuperWhisper, supporting both streaming and non-streaming responses. Also improves meta label stripping and context window in ai-conversation.js, and updates documentation in CLAUDE.md to reflect new features and ES module usage.

commits.headline: Potential fix for code scanning alert no. 5: Double escaping or unescaping (#19)
commits.body: Co-authored-by: Copilot Autofix powered by AI <62310815+github-advanced-security[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>

commits.headline: fix: validation errors + feat: includeLastMessage for search (#18)
commits.body: * fix: remove outputSchema from tools returning external API data

commits.headline: fix: remove outputSchema from freescout_get_ticket to fix validation errors (#17)
commits.body: MCP SDK's JSON Schema conversion doesn't handle undefined values the same

commits.headline: refactor: make ThreadSchema fields optional for improved flexibility
commits.body: Updated ThreadSchema in types.ts to allow optional fields for type, body, created_by_customer, and created_at, enhancing schema flexibility and accommodating varied data structures.

commits.headline: refactor: enhance thread validation and normalization in index.ts
commits.body: Introduces type safety for thread types and adds validation functions to ensure threads have a valid type and creation date. Normalizes thread body content before processing. Updates filtering logic for customer and team messages to utilize the new validation methods, improving data integrity and handling.

commits.headline: fix: Add env loader and improve schema flexibility
commits.body: Introduces a new loadEnv function to load environment variables quietly using dotenv, with corresponding tests. Updates index.ts to use the new loader and dynamically read the version from package.json. Relaxes ThreadSchema and ConversationSchema field requirements in types.ts to allow for more flexible and optional data structures. Updates .gitignore to exclude new token files.

commits.headline: Improve process locking, input validation, and async usage
commits.body: Refactored scheduler locking to handle race conditions and ensure single instance. Updated workflow scheduler notification logic to respect meta settings. Improved URL sanitization and test coverage for MCP executor. Migrated shell command execution in developer activity report to use execFile for better security and reliability. Enhanced VoiceInput mic deactivation logic to use refs for state consistency. Added 'vars' property to run-workflow schema for workflow context injection.

commits.headline: Add celebrity research workflow and test script
commits.body: Introduces a new workflow specification for comprehensive celebrity research, including contact and busking history extraction, in workflows/on-demand/celebrity-comprehensive-research.md. Adds scripts/test-celebrity-research.js to simulate workflow output and generate CSV results for a test batch of celebrities without consuming API quota.

commits.headline: Add restart feature and activity report documentation
commits.body: Introduced documentation for the assistant self-restart feature and usage examples, including architecture plans for the activity report system. Added scripts and tools for generating, updating, and deploying activity reports, as well as initial test coverage for the restart manager. Updated session manager and developer activity report logic to support new features.

commits.headline: Add AI-to-AI conversation script and improve TTS/voice features
commits.body: Introduces scripts/ai-conversation.js for automated conversations between personalities, with optional TTS playback. Updates voice-client.js to allow skipping responses mid-playback. Enhances ElevenLabs TTS with SSML pauses and speed control, and allows specifying voiceId in TTS API. Adds stop sequences to Ollama client to prevent self-conversation loops. Minor refactors and documentation updates included.

commits.headline: fix: set account_id via env var instead of wrangler.toml
fix: add account_id to wrangler config
chore: update activity data for 2026-01-05
Initial commit: Activity transparency report
Update wrangler.toml for Cloudflare Pages deployment
commits.body: Reconfigure wrangler.toml for Cloudflare Pages by updating the project name, removing worker-specific settings, and specifying the build output directory. Environment variables and secrets are now managed according to Pages conventions.

commits.headline: Add developer activity report tool and Cloudflare Workers config
commits.body: Introduced a new 'developer_activity_report' tool in mcp-tools.json and tool-filters.json, providing schema and description for generating developer activity reports. Added initial implementation at tools/developer-activity-report.js. Updated Cloudflare Workers configuration in mcp-tools.json. Modified related workflow documentation to reference the new tool.

commits.headline: docs: update diagrams for Streamable HTTP transport
commits.body: - Replace SSE Bridge references with MCP Bridge in diagrams

commits.headline: docs: add mermaid diagrams for architecture visualization
commits.body: - Add 4 diagrams to README.md (architecture, graph vs vector, bridge discovery, scoring)

commits.headline: Daily Context Briefing
Deployed Sunset Voyages
Enhance voice-client functionality with voice interrupt detection and new controls
commits.body: - Added voice interrupt feature to allow users to interrupt playback by speaking.

commits.headline: Midnight Miqu 70B Migration
docs: Update MCP documentation and server implementation for Streamable HTTP support
commits.body: Renames SSE bridge to MCP bridge in documentation, clarifies transport options, and emphasizes Streamable HTTP as the recommended protocol. Updates server implementation to support both Streamable HTTP and deprecated SSE, including enhancements for session management and health checks. Adds comprehensive tests for Streamable HTTP transport and ensures backward compatibility with SSE.

commits.headline: docs: add Streamable HTTP transport support
commits.body: - Add Streamable HTTP as primary remote transport in server.json

commits.headline: feat: upgrade SDK to 1.25.1 and add MCP registry support

commits.headline: Fix agent profile warnings and tool schema validation
commits.body: - Normalize input_schema to inputSchema in native tool registry

commits.headline: Add support workflow and bug diagnosis scenarios to test harness
commits.body: - wpf-support-investigation: Simulates daily workflow task format

commits.headline: Add universal agent test harness with scenario-based evaluation
commits.body: - Add test-agent-scenarios.js runner with rubric-based evaluation

commits.headline: Enhance file locking in process-session-memory.py for improved error handling
commits.body: Updated the file locking mechanism in process-session-memory.py to handle OSError exceptions more robustly. Added logic to ensure proper locking and unlocking of files, including handling empty files and restoring the original file position after operations. This change aims to enhance the reliability of session memory processing.

commits.headline: Add DALL-E hero image with dramatic sunset cruise ship
commits.body: - Generated photorealistic hero image of luxury cruise ship sailing into golden sunset

Add wrangler.toml for Pages configuration

commits.body: - Added Markdown-to-HTML conversion feature

commits.headline: Sunset Voyages Launch
Initial commit: Sunset Voyages satirical site
commits.body: Dark comedy parody of predatory senior cruise services:

commits.headline: Add artisan workshop image to About page (with perfectly normal TV)
Enhance AutoMem scripts for robust JSON handling and error logging
commits.body: Updated capture-deployment.sh and capture-test-pattern.sh to utilize jq for JSON encoding, ensuring better error handling and memory record creation. Improved session-memory.sh to generate session context using jq, added timeout handling for session processing, and ensured temporary file cleanup. Enhanced queue-cleanup.sh with validation checks and logging for better error tracking. These changes aim to strengthen the reliability and maintainability of the AutoMem scripts.

commits.headline: fix: use args array for Windows compatibility in Claude Desktop config
commits.body: Windows can convert forward slashes to backslashes during config parsing,

commits.headline: refactor: preserve raw HTML in notes formatting
commits.body: Updated the FreeScoutAPI to preserve raw HTML in notes instead of escaping it. Adjusted the related test to reflect this change, ensuring that HTML content is correctly handled when sent to FreeScout.

commits.headline: Update MCP tools configuration and agent schemas
commits.body: Modified the MCP tools configuration to include a new agent_name field for better agent profiling. Updated the lastUpdated timestamp to reflect recent changes. Enhanced agent schemas by adding evaluation rubrics for automated testing and refining existing properties for clarity. Improved the WP Fusion Expert agent profile with a mandatory verification phase and structured configuration. Adjusted various agent profiles to ensure consistency and added detailed documentation for new features. Refactored code for better readability and maintainability.
